Package server

Interface ServerProtocol

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameClientHandler
    public interface ServerProtocol
    Interface that must be implemented by a class that communicates with a client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clientBoard​(java.lang.String encodedBoard)
      Receives the encoded version of client's game board and sets it in the game.
      void enemyName​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Method that sends to the client their opponents name.
      void exit()
      When of the players wish to exit this method informs the game about it and shuts down communication with the client.
      void gameOver​(java.lang.String playerName, boolean winType)
      Method that informs clients when game ends.
      void gameSetup​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Sends out to clients the name of the player that has the first move in the game.
      void handleHello​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Handles the handshake sent in by the client.
      void move​(int x, int y)
      A move that the client makes.
      void nameExists()
      When client tries to connect but in handshake includes the same name as the opponent.
      void update​(int x, int y, boolean isHit, boolean isSunk, boolean isLate, java.lang.String lastPlayerName, java.lang.String nextPlayerName)
      Method to update both clients after one of them has made a move.

    • Method Detail

      • handleHello

        void handleHello​(java.lang.String playerName)
        Handles the handshake sent in by the client. Checks whether the name included is not already taken in the game, if it isn't then sets that name in the game, if it is then sends back nameExists().
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name submitted by the client in the handshake.

      • nameExists

        void nameExists()
        When client tries to connect but in handshake includes the same name as the opponent. This methods sends back message informing the client of that.

      • clientBoard

        void clientBoard​(java.lang.String encodedBoard)
        Receives the encoded version of client's game board and sets it in the game. The setter method in the game takes care of decoding the board.
        Parameters:
        encodedBoard - The encoded game board sent in by the client.

      • enemyName

        void enemyName​(java.lang.String playerName)
        Method that sends to the client their opponents name.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The opponents name.

      • gameSetup

        void gameSetup​(java.lang.String playerName)
        Sends out to clients the name of the player that has the first move in the game. Also starts the move timer for the player that has the first move.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name of the player that goes first.

      • move

        void move​(int x,
          int y)
        A move that the client makes. This method then make the respective move in the game and also cancels the timer that was set for the move.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the move.
        y - The Y coordinate of the move

      • update

        void update​(int x,
            int y,
            boolean isHit,
            boolean isSunk,
            boolean isLate,
            java.lang.String lastPlayerName,
            java.lang.String nextPlayerName)
        Method to update both clients after one of them has made a move.
        Parameters:
        x - the X coordinate of the move made
        y - the Y coordinate of the move made
        isHit - indicates whether move was a hit on a ship
        isSunk - indicates whether move sunk a whole ship
        isLate - indicates whether the previos move was a late move
        lastPlayerName - The name of the player that made the move
        nextPlayerName - The name of the player that should make the next move

      • gameOver

        void gameOver​(java.lang.String playerName,
              boolean winType)
        Method that informs clients when game ends. This could happen if 5 minutes pass, someone sinks all of opponent's ships or one of the clients disconnects.
        Parameters:
        playerName - Of the winner, or empty string if it's a tie.
        winType - indicates what kind of end it was in the game. True: if game ended normally, false if one of the players quit.

      • exit

        void exit()
        When of the players wish to exit this method informs the game about it and shuts down communication with the client.
